The whole hotel is spotlessly clean, there’s always someone sweeping or polishing something, if you see something on the floor then you can guarantee someone will sweep it up a moment later. The rooms were cleaned to a very high standard with some lovely towel art from the maids. The toilets in the hotel & by the pool were always spotless – they must clean the ones by the pool every half an hour or so as they were always clean! The only grip is that as the hotel is sort of open air so apart from your rooms there isn’t any air con, they have fans to move the air about but coming from not so sunny England I did struggle a bit with the heat. Evening entertainment was fine, not my thing but only on for a short while. 5th Avenue was great, we only went a couple of times but had the best steak we’ve ever eaten in the Argentinean steak house – highly recommended, We had beers, bread, a starter each & the most expensive steaks on the menu & it came to £60 which for a meal like that is very reasonable. Every single member of staff (except who checked us in!) should be congratulated as there are so friendly & so lovely, always smiling & giving you a cheery Hola! Never once did they look grumpy or unhappy in their work, they really made the holiday something special. I would highly recommend this hotel & hope to visit again soon.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you Jose, Pablo, Jesus and Teresa!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Buschiee2
Reviews.Content: This was our second time staying at this resort and we were treated like Kings!!! We fully plan on visiting this resort next year. Our stay here was everything we could have asked for and more. We credit this solely to the staff that took care of us. Guadelupe was our house keeper and she was more that perfect. If you are ever wanting a vacation where you are guaranteed to have a wonderful time, this is the place. What wonderful people you are and we miss you!!! The most enjoyable part of our stay was the friendly service provided by the beach servers, Jose, Pablo, Jesus and Teresa. Anytime you needed anything they were right there. As hard as they worked in the hot sun trudging through the sand all day, they were always smiling and willing to bend over backwards to take care of us. They are just the most wonderfull people and we will never forget them. We love you guys!!! See you next year. However we do wish it was sooner.

Reviews.Title: “gorgeous place”
Reviews.Author: lyndsay2930
Reviews.Content: me and my husband stayed here for our honeymoon and it was complete paradise.every day the maid made a different creature with the towels.the staff was so kind and friendly and we loved the fact that the beach was so close.I would highly recommend that any one who is planning on goiing to this ppart of mexico book this gorgeous hotel we would have been willing to pay double the price for this super holiday

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Staff”
Reviews.Author: bandd11
Reviews.Content: Our first trip to Mexico was awesome, largely due to the staff and accommodations at the Gran Porto Real. This was our first trip for a destination wedding and we were very pleased. Special thanks to Rodrigo & Carlos...wait staff at the Albatross main dining room who provided exceptional service and always greeted us with a big smile. They are a definite asset to the organization!

Reviews.Title: “It was fantastic!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: johnkathykellybrad
Reviews.Content: We found the service excellent through out the whole trip. Ivan , in the buffet was fantastic . He made us feel very welcome and his service was exceptional! Very friendly, happy and cheerful. He seemed to like his job. Also Ismal was very helpful with language ( us learning Spanish words) and any questions we had. The 24 hr restaurant was not too great as there could have been more variety of food also the beer taps seemed to be out of order a lot but there is a bar next to it that was happy to give you beer.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful place to go to relax and have fun!!!”
Reviews.Author: Fieldsgirl3
Reviews.Content: Our room (375) was very nice and comfortable. The maid service was excellent. Our waiters on the beach were fantastic, especially Pablo and Jesus. They were always smiling and asked us often if we needed drinks. We loved them both. We also thought the sports entertainment team was wonderful, including Armando, Victor, Alejandro, Cesar and Karina. What a great group. They made everything fun! Just today I recommended this resort to some friends. I am looking forward to coming back again next year.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we definitely will be back!!”
Reviews.Author: cbrown5192
Reviews.Content: The staff were very friendly!! My wife and I, as well as the others in our group, were treated like Royalty!! From the pool activities to the meals our experience and service were exceptional!! The food selection in the buffet was different each day and always fresh and appetizing. The omelets for breakfast were always delicious! The Italian restaurant was amazing. My group ate there several nights and we were always very pleased with our meal and service. The excursions available from the lobby covered every possible thing you could do in the Yucatan area!! A special mention for the staff at the Buffet, Italian restaurant and pool, they made our vacation one of the best we have ever had!!!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Resort with an even better Staff!”
Reviews.Author: Caleb22393
Reviews.Content: This resort was outstanding! From the time we arrived, we were greeted by an outstanding! Little did we know that we were in for a real treat! the rooms were very clean, and Reyna did a wonderful job on our room. We sometimes get a little messy so thank you! It was wonderful to come back to our rooms with different animals made out of towels everyday! the restaurants were wonderful and they had a diverse menus. The lobby bar was one of my favorite places to hang out due to the wonderful bartenders Cris and Dave. They were very personable and entertaining. They were great at their jobs, and made my trip that much greater! everyone loved Cris and Dave!!!! if you see them say hello! The all inclusive benefits were awesome, everything was included. The beach had some rocks in it, which made it hard for swimming, but right across the pier was a wonderful beach! Thanks everyone at the resort for making it awesome! Cris and Dave, See you next time!

Reviews.Title: “Our 4th time here and we love this place”
Reviews.Author: rhemilby
Reviews.Content: This resort has everything you could be looking for. The rooms are always clean and very spacious. Although the decor may not be as updated as the newer resorts we didn't mind because we weren't there to stay in the room. The service we received here is amazing, that is why we keep going back to the GP. We have made several friends here from the bellboys to the capitan of the restaurant. Meals are always very good. You can choose from a buffet style restaurant or Italian or Mexican and then they also have a pool side grill and a sushi bar. The pool is divided into 2 sections, one side for activities and the other for swimmers. The activity team here is wonderful, there is never a lack of things going on at the poolside. There is water polo, volleyball, water basketball, other water games and several out of water activities like beach volleyball, horseshoes, bike riding tours etc. The beach and pool have servers that actually bring your drink to you all day! There are shows at night by the pool and you are served drinks there as well. One example of how well we were treated here is that our friend, Eliazar (the capitan of the restaurant), arranged a private dinner for us out on the lawn with candlelight. We had our personal chef (Dioscory) who served our meal one course at a time and it was delicious!! The best I've ever tasted! We were so surprised to receive such a wonderful gift. We also had 2 waiters that evening Sergio and Jhony who were there with anything we wanted.It was truly a very generous and heartwarming night. Others that were great friends and help while here are: Ismael and Frank and Verlan in the Albatross restaurant, Pablo, Jesus, Teresa, Rebekah, Miriam the beach and poolside servers, Dave the bartender, and Alex, Jordi and Erika at the front desk and bellboys Julio and Benni. There are so many more that deserve to be mentioned but it is so hard to remember them all. Our maid was always very thorough and always left us a very pretty towel art figure on our bed. One thing to remember is that these people do not usually see the tips that the travel agents say are included in your package deal. We always tipped them something and they were very thankful. Another thing about this resort is that it is located very near 5th avenue shopping strip (walking distance) and also the ferry to Cozumel leaves from there so you can go across I think for $35. There are always fishing trips, parachuting and para-sailing offered on the beach also. Lots to do or if you just want to relax it's great for that too.

Reviews.Title: “The great service and staff was what made our trip so memorable!”
Reviews.Author: beachbabe2121
Reviews.Content: I just came back from a week long stay at the Grand Porto Real, Playa Del Carmen. I was there with a group of friends for a wedding. Our group varied in age from toddlers, to grand parents and everyone enjoyed themselves just the same. First I'd like to thank the amazing staff for the fabulous service they provided us. The pool bar staff (Salvador, Avila, and Fabian) always greeted us with a smile, even when it was super busy. They took the time to chat with us, remembered our names and our favorite drinks. Each bar tender took the time to get to know each one of us. We closed the bar every single night and then moved inside to the lobby bar. The lobby bar staff (Dave and Chris) were just as friendly! On the days we speant on the beach we received amazing service from Jose and Jesus! We didnt even have to order our next round because we knew it was on its way. There were also a few ladies serving around the pool, dont remember their names but they were so sweet as well! The entertainment staff also did an amazing job of keeping us entertained and involved, without being annoying. Chicken (Victor) and Armando knew our names from day 1! Each day they would be sure to ask us how things were going and to make sure we were having an amazing time. There were poolside activites each day (volleyball, water polo, spanish lessons, bingo, the "crazy game" that changed each day, etc. They also ran a fun water aerobics class. They were so nice and working so hard that we just had to say yes and participate in most activities. For those who didnt want to participate or wanted quiet time, they could go to the other side of the pool divided by a bridge to the pool bar. The beach was the only downside. While there were more beach chairs and beds than they could ever fill, but it just wasnt appealing to sit down there. Every 2 days the seaweed would pile up and the staff would spend a full day clearing it. the beach was eroding so to get down to the water you had to walk over a metre or 2 of sand bags. Then for the next 20 metres the water is up to mid thigh and doesnt get deaper than that. A little further down the beach it gets a bit nicer though. Fortunately it was so great sitting by the pool all day that we didnt really miss the beach. (Dont get me wrong, we did go down there a couple of times throughout the week) They also have free kayaks to take out so it was nice to head out a little further into deaper waters. As for food, there were a few options. The buffet, the Italian restaurant and the Mexican restaurant. All 3 were good options, we always enjoyed our food and it was quick too. The only issue we had was when we dined as a group of 23. They wouldnt take a reservation, but then when we'd show up they had a hard time seating us all together. They often had to run between restaurants to get enough high chairs for the 3 toddlers that were there with us. In the end they always made sure that you were leaving happy. There was also the 24hour bar where you could serve yourself drinks and snacks. The snacks werent always super appetizing to us, but the guys seemed to like the little sandwiches in the middle of the night. The room service was amazing as well! I highly recommend the chicken fajitas (which we orderred multiple times throughout the week). The location was great! Right off of 5th avenue where you could go shopping, out for dinner or drinks, or just a few blocks away out dancing. Gustavo from guest services was so sweet! He offered to meet with us at whatever time we wanted to show us the best places to go. And then he even got us in without paying the cover charge. I flew into Cozumel and took the ferry across to the mainland. The ferry was a little rough but I was alright, and I tend to get sea sick. It was only about $30 round trip. The walk from the ferry pier to the hotel was along 5th avenue (pedestrian road) about 16 blocks and was very safe to walk by myself. The shows seemed to be good, we only watched one of them but we enjoyed it. We stayed in an "ocean view" suite. Really our balcony overlooked the Royal hotel next door but if you looked towards the beach you could see the ocean. This wasnt an issue for us though. The room was big and beautiful and the shower was large as well. I suggest trying to get a room with a balcony overlooking the pool. You can watch the show from your balcony each night, order room service for breakfast and enjoy it out on the balcony, etc. All in all we had a fabulous time! The staff really made us feel like it was our home away from home. I highly recommend it if you can get over the eroding beach. The pros heavily outweigh the cons!

Reviews.Title: “I would go back in a heartbeat!”
Reviews.Author: littlejessmontreal
Reviews.Content: I literally just got back from the Gran Porto Real and I am sad to be home! FOOD: Awesome, they only have 2 restaurants Mexican and Italian but everything I ordered was delicious and cooked to perfection. Try the Salmon at the Italian...Soooo good! The Buffet was good, but you know, buffet stuff, I mostly ate breakfast there and it was super yummy, the fruit yogurts and omeleltes made it onto my plate every single day! At the Beach Grill eat nachos guacamole and salsa....my favourite lunch ever!!!!! ROOM: We had a junior suite, it was super clean, comfy, quite, we had a party in our room and nobody even complained, I never heard anyone through the walls STAFF: I think these people are what made my trip so enjoyable!! Bar staff : JOSE, SALVADOR, AVILA, FABIAN, CHRIS and my good friend DAVE, you guys are awesome and I will miss you!!! Entertainment: Chicken (VICTOR) and ARMANDO, you made my trip so much fun, so much enthusiasm, I most enjoyed dance lessons by the pool, we should learn more moves!!! and yes SAMANTHA at the front desk, you were very helpful and friendly at check out :) BEACH/POOL: missing a swim up bar but the waiters are really good and are always running to bring you drinks, sometimes they just would bring you a refill without being asked! TERESA and ELIZABETH took good care of us. The beach is nice, but they have to work hard to clear the seaweed away and if you like to go in the ocean a lot, stay at the Royal next door, the beach there is nicer. Overall I had a great trip, I liked playa better that Cancun and I am a party girl who loves to dance, swim in the ocean and enjoy the sun! The atmosphere is great in playa and the weather was FANTASTIC!

Reviews.Title: “What a brilliant Holiday this was!”
Reviews.Author: jean1921
Reviews.Content: The Hotel was situated in a great location, it was light, airy and always kept spotlessly clean. Our room was a junior suite, which was always kept clean, as the hotel was. It had a massive walk in shower, the only problem was there was not alot of access room between the shower and the door. The mini bar was always well stocked and the supply of bottled water topped up on a regular basis. The displays made with the towels daily were a delight to see. Right from walking through the door of the Hotel at the start of our holiday and encountering the reception staff we knew we were going to have a good holiday, they were all very friendly, polite and knew thier job well. All of the staff throughout the holiday were great but especially restaurant staff Capitan Eliazar, waiters Jamie and Tom, waitresses in the lobby bar Miriam, Yuliana and Margarita, sports and entertainment rep Cesar, who although we never participated in any activities, made us feel so welcome every day, however we did watch the shows at night and especially enjoyed the Decades show. Cleaners Osvaldo and one who we forget to get the name of, who never stopped working but were so friendly, Chef Jorge, who cooked us a fantastic meal on our last night and a lady who checked us in to the main restaurant for breakfast and lunch every day (who again we forgot to get her name) was always smiling. 5th Avenue shops were good to walk around but don't bother taking a trip to the shop mall as not much there. We used the local ADO buses to get to Tulum and Cancun, great and very cheap and also made our way over to Cozumel on the ferry, which is at the end of 5th Avenue, but a good way to get to it was by walking up the beach. Top Tip - don't use Taxis outside the hotel as they are more expensive. We feel that all the staff should congratulate themselves on their contribution to the success of this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very relaxing and beautiful view”
Reviews.Author: IllinoisButterfly
Reviews.Content: I just got back from staying at the Gran Porto Real in Playa del Carmen for 8 nights. The second day we got there we were able to pay to upgrade from an ocean view room to an ocean front room. I highly recommend the ocean front room. We were very happy with the room. The hotel is VERY clean and you will always see staff cleaning! The staff is very friendly. Samantha at the front desk was so helpful and very sweet. We enjoyed David at the lobby bar. He was so friendly and also very helpful. We already miss our chats with him! Ismael and Frank (Albatross restaurant) were great! They were so fun and personable and also GREAT waiters. Now I have to mention a big dissapointment that happened our second day there. Keep in mind that we were on our honeymoon. A gentleman from guest services suggested that we go have breakfast and check out the sister resort across the street (Royal). We unfortunately agreed and didn't realize until we were sitting over at a desk that this was a presentation to buy a membership. I realize we could have immediately left, but being our first time in Mexico and only our second day felt unsure of ourselves yet. We were stuck there for over 3 hours listening to salesman trying to have us buy into this hotel membership. We were real upset and pissed off after we finally were excused. But, quickly decided not to let that ruin our trip. Overall, this was a great trip and we hope to return again someday!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful location and wonderful staff.....”
Reviews.Author: Tyler02
Reviews.Content: This was our first time in Mexico and we can certainly say we would return. We wanted a relaxing holiday and this is what we got. The standard of cleanliness was evident throughout and all the staff were extremely friendly and nothing at all was too much trouble. The Mexican Restaurant was very good, but for us the Italian was surperb - and Delia looked after us really well and made us feel special when she knew that it was my husband's birthday the one day and mine the next. Maria in Lobby Bar looked after us very well as did Jesus in the Albatros Restaurant. But to be fair all the staff were brilliant.... The hotel was located close to 5th Avenue - great for shopping and very vibrant

Reviews.Title: “great relaxing place to stay-safe”
Reviews.Author: rcrane
Reviews.Content: Hotel was spotless-no sand on the floors-beach was 6 feet past the great poolStayed in ocean front room-had balconey with chairs and hammock-(took advantage of both).This was our 4th trip to the same resort.Saw several of the same employees-Pablo,Jesus-beach servers,Fabian,Salvador, Alvia-bartenders and of Reyna from housekeeping.Everyone is so friendly-you will right at home.The junior suite is just the right size to have some space,yet not so much you get lost.We will continue to go there because it is our idea of vacation-no worries,relax, play activities-best of all price is right!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Service”
Reviews.Author: ellebee7
Reviews.Content: This is long overdue but I wanted to express how amazing our service was at the Gran Porto Real. We had an amazing stay and were accommodated very well. All staff were friendly and very helpful. Two bartenders in particular did an exceptional job - Lorenzo Avila and Ivan Be. They were very warm, fun, and provided amazing service. They definitely had us coming back to there bar every night. Thank you so much for making our stay so much fun!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Vacation - Can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: AKC_Portland_OR
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean, comfortable and had every amenity. I was very impressed with how hard each staff member worked at their individual jobs and were very attentive to each guest, doing their best to ensure the most enjoyable stay. The room was well-appointed with a very comfortable bed. The food was terrific at all the restaurants - not a bad meal in 5 days. Enrique at the front desk even changed our room without a problem because we wanted a different view. Service on the beach was impeccable - Pablo kept us fed and hydrated and was so fun - we looked forward to seeing him each day.

Reviews.Title: “The place to go to relax and have fun”
Reviews.Author: Cruisenut24
Reviews.Content: To say this place is inviting is an understatememt. The staff are amazing. Service by the pool is the best-Rebecca, Teresa, Patty, Jesus are always there to serve you. Miriam in the lobby bar is a sweetie, and very friendly. The crew that do the activities are awesome-Karina, Cesar, Victor, Alejandro and Armando are so very nice and lots of fun. Ismael, Manny and Vermane at the buffet are very efficient. The Italian restaurant has the best food, especially the tornadoes of beef (so tender) Amador the waiter and Delia the receptionist are adorable (and a couple) they were so much fun. The Mexican restaurant food was very good, and sitting on the balcony in the evening there is such a nice breeze. The 24 hour room is a nice place to get a snack any time. The drinks are ok, not exceptional, the food good, the staff amazing. We never had a person go by us without saying hello. By far the friendliest place we have ever stayed. The beach at the hotel is irroded and not very pretty, but God knows they try to keep it up working vigilantly our whole stay. The pool and the activities are great and were enough for us. You can book parasailing right through the hotel and charge it to your room. The rooms are nice size, and kept very clean (the air conditioner works well too).

Reviews.Title: “6 times a Charm”
Reviews.Author: chevyMn
Reviews.Content: What can I say....We love this place. 7years ago we got married on the beach at the GPR, ever since, we have been coming back for our anniversary. (Except for one year) We just love it here, the resort is so nice, the food is great, the location is the best and most of all the staff is awesome. I really need to give a huge thanks to Pablo, you are the best beach/pool waiter the GPR has, you always brought me my Three beers every time you passed, I will beat you in arm restling one of these years. Jesus, you also took care of my wife and I on the beach and made sure our glass was never empty. Verlain, you are the happiest employee at the GRP, always smiling and great work ethic, we always sat in your area for breakfast and you took care of us the entire time, you are one of the reasons we come back, to see your smiling face. Avila, what can I say.. you got me drunk at night up in the pool bar, What a blast. You always saw me coming and had a beer ready for me. You do such a great job and are very fun to talk with. We will see you all next May 2012, cant wait. We had the best time again and we call the GPR our 2nd home. Thanks to every body for a wonderful vacation. Pablo, Verlain, Jesus, Avila, we will see you next year.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT, spotless clean, super friendly Staff, trully a must go!”
Reviews.Author: scsul
Reviews.Content: I would like to take this opportunity to express how happy and pleased we were with our stay there! We can't wait to come back there! From the time we walked in, Richard was amazing and extremely helpful and we were able to upgrade to the Jr Ocean view Suite on the 3rd floor just above the OKI Kid's club, for a price that we could afford, since we were on a tight budget. The view was very nice and the staff was also kind enough to bring us a roll away bed for our son! Thank you so much! Loved it. The Staff at the Gran Porto Real really and truly makes the difference! Poeple like Richard, Mar, Teresa, Ismael,Mora, Jaime, Antonio, Guadalupe, Ciro, Cruz, Dulce, Sabina, Karina, Diana, Nelly, Cesar, Victor, Alejandro, Armando, Julio, Freddie, Benigno and many others, you just cannt find anywhere else. To understand it, you need to meet them! They are uniques!! They are unbeatable!!! I am yet to find people like them, happy friendly and most of all very very professionals. In every possible way. They are just outstanding professionals, of the highest level of customer service and professionalism. They did treat us like we were at home, or even better, they sure made us feel like we were at our second home, our home away from home. Always with a smile on their faces, always happy and ready to help and welcome us! The girls at the Kid's Club were amazing! They have what it takes to entertain a child and at the same time, ensure he/she is safe and enjoying the playtime at the same time they learn and develop. I did notice the quantity of educational material they had and how well they used them. Also, one thing I must mention to you is how clean, or I should say, how spotless the resort is. From the floors inside to the pool, area outside to the sidewalk! Simply clean! Even inside the bird's cage...CLEAN. I did chek and I saw an employee cleaning it. We did walk on our bare feet a few times just to see it, and sure enough, no sand at all on the floors. What really caught our attention was the amount of people cleaning the resort. At some point, there was more people ready to clean than actual "dirt" ! And cleanness is the one thing that guest to pay a lot of attention and is a "deal breaker", whether to stay on that place or not! The Gran Porto Real is spotless clean, everywhere. Our bathroom was amazing, large, spacious and...clean! Wow... From the time we hear that a certain place is not clean, that's it. Nobody goes there. It the type of risk that no one wants to take. Nobody wants to get sick from a dirty place, right? And the Porto was just spotless clean, even the outside washrooms, were always being cleaned and well maintained by the staff. This is very important. Floors were washed several times throughout the day, every day! Also, the variety of choices at Albatros was very good, please keep it up. We ate there several times, all breakfasts and all lunches and most dinners. Loved it. I must admit that I am a picky person, I just don't eat anything , anywhere. I was happy to find several options for all my meals there and they were all delicious. Very well made, prepared with love. My son also loved the "Mickey mouse" pancakes in the mornings. Just perfect. This proves once again, how creative the Staff is, not there just to work, but to entertain, to make sure the person in front of them is enjoying everything and will certainly come back. We did eat at Maria's and Il Pescatore and liked both restaurants very much. Nice atmosphere, nice staff and very good food. Variety is also what they have in mind, since they receive guests from all over the world. I was amazed to see how much they had!!! Also, we really liked all the activities the Resort has for the guests, either indoors or outdoors. Day or night. They were perfect. The pools were also very clean, Ciro was there everyday checking the water and I did ask him a few times how it was. He was always kind to tell me that everything is good and safe. Also, the Security for the Resort is just fabulous. 24/7/365, and everywhere, beach, pools , streets, sidewalks, etc.. They are there and at the same time, discrete! Ensuring we are all safe and enjoying our wonderful time there. *The only thing that bothered us a little bit was the noise at night, from the Band playing on the lobby/bar area, until 11pm. Perhaps the Management could make arrangements for them to play until 10PM since lots of guest do travel with small children and they go to sleep early, like 9pm or or. We did come home missing every single one of them/you! The Staff treated us like family, I am so happy to think of them and I do hope that next time we are there, I can meet them once again. Thank you all very much for keeping this Resort simply the BEST ! PLEASE KEEP UP THE EXCELLENT WORK !!!! Miss you all. We are looking forward to our return!!! As soon as we can! We recommend this Resort to everyone. Please go and have lots of fun.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful...”
Reviews.Author: mrrtys
Reviews.Content: I came at the hotel last year in november with my mam.. it is the best hotel i have ever been.. the location is so perfect and the people who work there are so nice... Yendaly ;-)

Reviews.Title: “Best service ever.... Made the trip”
Reviews.Author: Davidmiraglia
Reviews.Content: The staff and their service was incredible particularly our beach waiter Pablo. He never left us "dry" and really stood out as far as exceeding our expectations- he went above and beyond. All our service professionals were excellent. Our rooms were extremely clean. The food was fresh and very good. We highly recommend this all inclusive in Playa.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Safe and Awesome”
Reviews.Author: MissLaura2011
Reviews.Content: We had the pleasure of staying at the Gran Porto Real in April with our adult children and their girlfriends. This is a small hotel but big in value, we really liked the location as it is close to town and 5th avenue. The staff at here is just amazing everyone of them from the front desk to the staff that was cleaning the bathrooms. The were always smiling and very respectful, I was really impressed by the way all the staff treated the children. We did not have young children with us but I noticed on many occasions when the staff was there to assist the parents even though they were not asked. It just makes you feel so safe and cared for, if you would prefer not to be around children you may not like this hotel. However there are areas of this hotel that you can go to and not even notice them. The entertainment team looks after the children and adults very well keeping them entertained with all sorts of activities. Our vacation would not have been as good without the awesome staff on the beach, Pablo, Jesus, Jose and Teresa you all made us feel so important. "Thanks for everything" We will surely come back for another vacation!! One closing note, I loved the booth in the corner where we could go and paint pottery, I ended up painting three pieces. This is the lively hood of the young man that runs the booth please support him if you are there as this is how he looks after his family. He was such a nice man I do not remember his name but all I can say is the hotel is very fortunate to have him as part of their family.

Reviews.Title: “excellent choice, proffesional, great sense of place especially the service.”
Reviews.Author: harrylnic
Reviews.Content: Out my 3 weeks stay in mexico, through cancun and playa, grand porto real resort provide one of the best services mexico, however, i went to grand aosis cancun, similar price, and i had a horrible time because their service is the worst in 4 continent i ever visit. where else, i like gran porto, i had wonder time especially the the first day on my arrival, i had a very warm welcoming from the front desk the moment they saw me, especially Cristhyan, he did his job as a professional in this servicing industry and i am really impress about that. Also, i love the food, the italian food was amazingly awesome. well, and the facilities. i will certainly recommend to all my business partner to try this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice resort”
Reviews.Author: SherryDS
Reviews.Content: My husband, 4 yr old son and stayed at this resort for one week to attend a family wedding. Our stay was good. I can't say there was really anything special about this place though. The food was decent (especially at the Italian restaurant). You can get ice cream upon request at the lunch/dinner buffet. Drink service was good. Try the mudslide- it was a big hit with our group. Our room was nice and the maid did a great job. However, our view must have been the worst in the entire building because we faced a service corridor with a giant wall that blocked any decent view that might have been beyond. And yes, the mattress was actually too firm for my liking. I had a sore back for most of the trip. The beach had nice fine sand, but there were boats anchored right in front of the resort so there was not much space for swimming. The snorkelling at the resort was not the greatest. Shopping nearby was good. The resort is a few minutes away from Walmart, Mega Store, and a Starbucks! There are also a Haagen Das and Ben and Jerry's stores nearby on 5th Ave. Travellers Tip: If you want to go to one of the major attraction parks, save some money and take a Colectivo and then pay the entrance fee at the park. Colectivos are fast, air conditioned, and will take you anywhere along the main highway. Ask the front desk for directions. Way cheaper than a taxi! I think the max cost is 30 pesos one way.

Reviews.Title: “GPR better than average”
Reviews.Author: grandmalibby
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a 5 night stay. We usually stay at 5 star resorts so you will know where I am coming from with this review. First of all it exceeded my expectations. The resort was very clean, very well maintained, sevice was excellent. We were in a standard room - 506 - not far from the adult pool. It was small - but we didn't spend much time in it. The beds were very comfortable. These are the reasons I would not go back.. There are only 2 resturants and a buffet. We went to the Italian which was good. Did not go to the Mexican because of negative comments from everyone we talked to. The buffet was just so-so.. For lunch we ate at the beach grill - all food was made in the hotel and brought out on trays.. would of liked a good grilled hamburger or hot dog. We actually ate dinner on 5th ave 2 nights (Blue Lobster-excellent- and the Tequilla Barrel) also ate lunch at Wicky's one afternoon. Relaxing- right on the beach. Nice They do not have enough umbrellas at the pool. I counted - for about 40 chairs (about half the pool) they had 7 umbrellas.. The last day there they brought out 3 more.. Why did they wait?? It was hot and people were complaining. I had to get up at 6AM every morning to play the towel game or else we would not of had an umbrella which you need in that heat. Beach is no problem.. lots of chairs and umbrellas. As others have posted the beach right in front of the resort in not good. There are many fishing boats tied up that when you walk down by the water you have to be very careful not to trip. Once past the boats the beach is beautiful. The property itself is not very large.. when out by the pool it was very close quarters. It's mainly a hotel on the beach. We have always stayed at resorts with lots of room for walking around..there is none here. After all is said and done.. we enjoyed ourselves.. it is a nice resort for the money spent. By the way,, most important of all.. drinks were very very good.. no complaints.. if they are too weak just ask for a double shot.. no problem.. Any questions you can PM me..

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for but here you get a little extra.”
Reviews.Author: Dave Rancourt
Reviews.Content: We spent 11 days here and had a great time. We read all the reviews and after staying here we have 1st hand experience. Berardo and Richard made it possible for us to see a room in every catagory. Some of the less favorable reviews came from people who want the cheapest rooms at the best hotels and are not satisfied. I find that a standard room at any hotel gets you a room with a bed/bathroom/Tv and a window. Thats all you pay for. If you want more upgrade. The staff at the GPR make the place a 5 Star. David and Chris At the Lobby Bar are # 1. Marco Ramos seemed to be everywhere all at the same time. The beach is in Great hands with Pablo and Jesus. Any hotel would be a 5 star with the staff at the GPR.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: 99softail
Reviews.Content: Just returned from Playa del Carmen on May 8,2011 My wife and two other couples made arrangements to stay at the Real Resort on Fifth Ave ,well that lasted about 15 hours we new what we were getting into when we booked the vacation ,it wasn't that great so we upgraded to the Gran Porto Real Resort , the resort was the best , we have traveled for the last 25 years , Mexico east coast , west coast and alot of the carribean .this place is the best . After breakfast at the Real at 7;30 we decided to move we were in our knew room at the Gran Porto at 9;30 ,Our room was 416 on the third floor with a Tranquillity pool outside our door and a 8 person hot tub next floor up ,outside over looking the beautiful grounds and the ocean. The food was great .the bars and drinks you couldn't ask for anything better , my only complaint was the beach ,the walking part of the beach was awesum ,the area in front of the resort that you can swim was coral but if you walked to either side of the resort the best ever. I am not great with names but all the bartenders and waitresses were great .we spent alot of time at what we called the swing bar on the beach [ best bar ] . The resturants were great with no reservations that was a real plus . We meet people from just about everywhere from Holland to Seattle and Canada very friendly all out to have a good time . This is the place quiet , very clean and so close to down town we watched three Bruins games at the Tequila Barrel Bar down town ,if you are thinking of going to this place for a relaxing vacation you won't regret it . ENJOY

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful service”
Reviews.Author: daddy1922
Reviews.Content: As others have said in other reviews, the resort is meticously cleaned by the staff. We had some wonderful waiters we want to mention: Florencio, Sergio, Ivan and manager Eliazar. A big thank-you to them and the many other dedicated workers including Omar and Dianne our housekeeper. The food was good especially the two a la carte restaurants, although by the end of the two weeks we were there we were ready for north american food. The beach is poor but only a few minutes down the way and there are some nice beaches. We went to the Gran Caribe, sister resort, in Cancun; it has a fabulous beach, but we found it loud with music playing all the time. The pool area here is nice but once again the vulume of the sports entertainment team is way too loud. Gran porto is much quieter and is geared more for families. Overall, we had a good time and would recommend Gran Porto.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location but get Ocean View Room”
Reviews.Author: Teg088
Reviews.Content: Perfect spot for proximity to 5th Avenue activity. Ocean front rooms 3rd floor recommended. Food was just okay, but needed more variety. Staff extremely helpful. Freddie the bell boy and Yendaly at the front desk were super helpful and take care of your needs. Definitely would return.

Reviews.Title: “Time of our lives”
Reviews.Author: Roadie125
Reviews.Content: The best family vacation ever, The staff were beyond wonderful. My young kids loved, loved the kids clubs. Shows were great at night. The beach was just ok not great for swimming and a little construction going on. Remember a small tip or two and go a long way. Hotel sometimes overbooked are room was not ready the first day, however my promptly gave me a one day refund and it was ready the next day. Rented a car one day, no problems easy to do right from the hotel. Food was good not great but we did not care, we drank alot : ) water is fine to drink no one in our party of five got sick. just sunburn, but that was our own fault. they even have a sunscreen lady at the pool. Loved our family vacation. Ps. 5th ave was fab and cheap 5 min walk was safe too.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic! Don't hesitate!”
Reviews.Author: BMWPOL
Reviews.Content: It was my third visit in the 'Real' Family. Twice at the Royal and for the first time, at the Gran Porto Real. I was hesitant at first, but was really impressed! Fantastic level of service. Room: Got a 'Walkout' upgrade, worth every penny! Right on the beach. Clean room, no issues. Beach: Great beach, but many rocks. You can walk a few minutes away and find great beaches. Pedro and Jesus always made sure we had enough to drink..... No need to ask, they are always one step ahead of you! Food: Great food. No issues. Italian restaurant was perfect for us. Israel is the waiter you want! Buffet: Great selection....Make sure you sit in the back and get Verlain and Rodrigo to serve you. They were by far 'truly outstanding' with us. Bar: Well, our evenings got better and better as we met great people. Dave & Chris (The Pink Panthera...an inside) were oustanding as well. They made us discover a variety of new 'drinks' as well as the local Tequila traditions. A warm and sincere Thank You to both! Overall: Don't hesitate!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Vacation, Exceptional Service”
Reviews.Author: 154943Sunshine
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough about our wonderful stay at the Gran Porto Real. Everything was perfect, I would recommend it to anyone. Our group had remarkable service throughout our stay, and a special mention for Yendaly and Freddie (the bell boy) for outstanding service...they both were amazaing! We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Gran Porto Real was a Grand Slam”
Reviews.Author: FourEyes4u
Reviews.Content: OK. I have to say that pulling up to the hotel, having the valet immediately take your bags and escort you to the reception desk was great, but . . . having the cocktail waitress there taking our drink order before we've even checked in was AWSOME!! This is a nice hotel with a fantastic staff. The room was OK, it was the Jr. Suite, it wasn't really very big, but who cares we hardly spent any time in there anyways. The beds and pillows were comfortable. The only negative about the room is that you can hear a lot of noise from the outside. Bring earplugs. The food was pretty good. For the $ paid we expected ok food but it was quite delicous on many nights. If we didn't like what the buffet served then we went over to one of the two sit down restaurants Porto Real has. We had room service twice. It was great. We actually never ate away from the hotel. The beach side parrilla was my favorite, I can eat ceviche everyday. The drinks were pretty good too. The waitresses at the pool kept them coming. The bartendars were always ready to make what ever you wanted. Make sure to ask for the type of top shelf alcohol for your drink every time you order or you will get a generic. I liked the Mojitos, Cosmos, Appletinis, Mudslides and all the beers were great. I especially liked the 24hour help your selfbar with snacks. You can go there anytime and serve yourself. It's stocked with top shelve alcohol, beer and wine. The wine was decent. Karina the hotel event's coordinator works hard organizing nightly shows and making sure the kids are taken care of in kids club. The shows were pretty good for the size of the hotel. Not to mention it's all included in your hotel stay. The kids club came in very handy. Nelly and the girls in kids club are great. My daughter really liked going there and making arts and crafts, participating in disco night, costume party and movie nights, water ballon fight. The pool was fun. You can hear music if you sit on one end. I have to say I wish that music was played everyday all day long. Some days they had music and you could hardley hear it. They had many contests at the pool they were fun to watch. The entire staff was very friendly. I think that tip is included in your stay but we tipped everyone a couple of dollars here and there. They work hard and make you feel special. On our last night Wednesday 4/27 we had the dinner buffet and we actually were VERY surprised that one of the fry cooks cooking up the meat was rude to my husband when he asked for tortillas. Later when I went to get some meat, he was gone from his station and someone else tried to help me. Thus the 4 stars on service. Everyone else's service was beyond a 5*. We loved being so close to Avenida Quinta. We also had a car rental that the hotel valet parked for us for free. Love this hotel. We will definetly return. We saw two weddings while we were there and thought this would be the place (or the Royal, across the street) we'd like to have our 25th Anaversary at or Family Reunion. Loved the Gran Porto Real as did our children.

Reviews.Title: “Gran Porto Real Resort and Spa exceeded my expectations in service, cleanliness and quality.”
Reviews.Author: bjlavery
Reviews.Content: There were around 40 of us who spent a week at the Gran Porto Real Resort and Spa in May 2011. We went for a wedding and everything was very, very nice. The service we received from everyone at the resort was exceptional. The food was fantastic and there were so many choices. I ate at all the outlets and loved everything! My room was spacious and I enjoyed everything. I couldn't say anything negative about this place at all.

Reviews.Title: “better than expected”
Reviews.Author: maxine2251
Reviews.Content: make sure you check all facilties and to find sushi bar ,and bars further down beach with swings also you have to experience coco bongo in town escorted by chicken we had a fantastic night and safe to walk home and staff and management were dedicated and enjoyed their work and pablo on the beach was more than happy to serve us our drinks and worked very hard, kids and family were occupied with vary activities ,would suit all ages for an relaxing fun holiday hotel close to 5th avenue for shopping ,also we would recomment their spanish wine!!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Staff”
Reviews.Author: gsavard
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were married in Mexico at the beginning of May, 2011 and we stayed for 2 weeks at the Gran Porto Real Resort. At the wedding party, the staff (Karina, Victor, Cesar, Alejandro and Armando) were excellent. Everybody at the wedding has told me that our wedding was the best wedding they've ever been to. The wine sommelier, Alonso, helped us pick the best wine to go with our meal and it was Incredible! The waiters at all of the restaurants were excellent, the most extraordinary were Juan Cauich, Antonio and Amabiael. These gentlemen were all excellent! The beach bar, tended by Avila, was excellent. Avila has a great sense of humor and we really enjoyed the drinks that he produced. Pablo, the beach server, was awesome! He always had our drinks right and produced them very quickly... a must in the Playa Del Carmen heat! We would also like congratulate the hotel manager, Marcos A Ramos. He made my wife and I extremely happy. At our special wedding dinner, there were flowers that we wanted to take back to our room for later. We couldn't take the glass vase, however, Marcos found us(!) in the lobby of the hotel that very night and gave us the flowers in a different vase so that we could take them to our room. He also burned us a copy of the CD that was playing in the background during our dinner. He was exceptional and I hope that all traveling to the Gran Porto Real has the pleasure of meeting him.

Reviews.Title: “Our 4th. visit & it keeps getting better!”
Reviews.Author: mamimexicana314
Reviews.Content: This was our 4th. visit to Grand Porto Real, but our first as Royal Club Members. We liked it so much, that we invited two other couples to join us and share the fun. They loved it! Our guests came from Italy & Argentina and they will be taking home great memories and experiences. On this first trip as Club Members we confirmed what a good decision we made when we joined. We would recomend the Hotel & the Club to anyone who wants to have a relaxing vacation . We also feel 10 days is the right length for a visit.. One week is just not enough... All services were first class. All the staff made us feel special and welcomed. It was nice to see a lot of familiar faces from the previous trips. See you next year!

Reviews.Title: “Incredible experience”
Reviews.Author: voyervidez
Reviews.Content: we were a group of ten and for us being alot we recieved excelent service,on which was very important,restaurant seating ,plenty of space and very prompt service.i recommend eating at Marias the food was perfecto ,plenty to do all around. the activities were endless.if your traveling with family and small children this is the place to be!just got home and couldnt wait to write this review!

Reviews.Title: “I would never return to this hotel even if they paid me to go”
Reviews.Author: victorredditch
Reviews.Content: this hotel is not a 5star hotel as they rate it I would rate it between 2/3star at best.The standard rooms are very small and with hardly any wardrobe space.The first choice brochure picture of room is very misleading as taken from certain angle to make it look bigger than it realy is.The terrace is just 2 chairs & a table outside your front door on a comunial walk way.The food in the buffet restuarant is not up to 5star hotel standard as other hotels I have stayed in including mexico where I have stayed in the last 2yrs.example what hotel serves cauliflower,broccoli and turkey etc for breakfast this one does.To top it all the so called tranquil pool is a joke they should rename it the madhouse pool as the gangs of drunken american and canadians take it over put their own loud music on with no regard to any other guests.The hotel seems to have no control to stop this as when I complained to desk they sent security to make them switch it off but as soon as he went on went the music and shouting and foul language began again.after several complaints on this I gave up.If you expect a relaxing holiday at a 5star hotel dont go here.

Reviews.Title: “Provided what it said on the tin”
Reviews.Author: pfm1906
Reviews.Content: Very enjoyable. Hotel tried the old upgrade trick on the first night ( your room is not ready but we have a better one that you can enjoy FOC tonight and pay extra for the rest of your stay if you like it)..this seems to happen a lot judging by commenst posted by others on trip advisor. After that initial hiccup, happy all the way...food is great, staff service is brilliant...a happier team I have never seen anywhere else ( and that includes service in 5* establishments). Only downside from my point of view is that none of the 3 restaurants is air conditioned but all have fans helping try to keep you cool. In Mexican restaurant and on patio in Italian restauarant this was passable but inside Itialain and The Albatros, it really gets pretty hot and uncomfortable in the absence of a/c. However against that, the quality of food and service by the waiting staff were absolutely first class. Breakfasts were a real pleasure with a very good choice of hot and cold food and again very happy and attentive staff. The building was kept immaculately clean all the time, Too easy access to alcohol in the 24/7 bar room for our under age boys did provide a headache to us at times. Hotel is very handily situated for access to shops and nightlife in 5th Avenue. Prices in shops were inflated due to heavy influence of tourists from US, Canada & Europe.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Vacation...didn't want to come home!”
Reviews.Author: srobbins8
Reviews.Content: We just got back from spending 5 nights at the Gran Porto Real and we had an amazing time. We stayed in the Junior Suite Oceanfront, which we upgraded to a few days before arriving and couldn't have been more happy. We saw the Junior Suite Oceanview room locations and it looks right out onto the property across the street. Our room looked out over the beach, ocean and the pool. It was a wonderful way to wake up each morning and well worth the upgrade in price! We ate at all of the restaurants and really had no complaints about the food. Just wish there was one more restaurant since we were there for a number of night. The food we had was good and being able to eat by the pool for lunch each day was wonderful. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They went out of their way to make sure that we were having a nice experience. We really have no complaints at all about the resort except that we wished we could have stayed longer. Would totally recommend this to anyone going to Playa!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding experience! Fantastic experience that made us feel like we were extra special!”
Reviews.Author: rdmh81
Reviews.Content: Truly, we felt like we were celebrities! The staff at Gran Porto Real are the best part of the whole experience. Each and every one takes a personal interest in your comfort during your stay. Say a special hello to Cesar, Pablo and Juan ~ they each deserve 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: “Not a peaceful holiday”
Reviews.Author: jenny190735
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have just returned from the Gran Porto Real. We could not fault the cleanliness of the room and the hardworking maid although storage space was very limited. The hotel itself is spotless and the service excellent but the food in the main buffett restaurant was hit and miss. If you are looking for a relaxing holiday then I would not recommend this hotel as the noise levels at the bars and the pool areas were very loud. The small pool that is advertised as a tranquility pool is definately not tranquil as every afternoon hoards of people descend on it and spend the afternoon shouting at each other, playing their loud music and stand in the pooling with their drinks getting drunk and it is impossible to go in the pool to swim or to get any peace. I appreciate that there are a lot of wedding parties at the hotel that are celebrating and if we had known this we would not have booked this hotel but there are also people there who are there for a bit of peace and quiet and a break from their busy working lives and you do not get it at this hotel. Unfortunately despite complaining about the noise and behaviour at this pool the staff seem to have no control over it as as soon as the security staff walk away the loud music goes back on and the drinking continues. Our room was also by this pool and we could not sit on our veranda in the afternoon because of the noise. I wouldn't recommend thisw hotel if you are looking for a relaxing holiday.

Reviews.Title: “clean hotel terrible food”
Reviews.Author: blobbly
Reviews.Content: after reading reviews for months booked this for my daughters 21lst birthday ,room nice and cleaned every day to perfection , loved Dave the barman total gentlemen. Fridge was surposed to be filled every day wasnt n when rang for refilling would get it filled 24 hrs later . Food wasnt nice who has cauliflower for breakfast or turkey . Would have liked to have real mexican food not tourism crap entertainment crap n when going to the restrauants on site u couldnt book just stand and wait 25 mins or more .Staff in mexican more interrested in chatting my daughter up instead of helping with menu as she is veggie.Staff in Italians first class and food amazing would nt go back to hotel though no effort for my daughters birthday

Reviews.Title: “Bring your pink pants and get to know the bartenders!”
Reviews.Author: jrabrown19
Reviews.Content: I consider Gran Porto Real my second home and I was there for only 5 days. The atmosphere was all about fun and relaxation, with a wide array of guests ranging from my group of 13 twenty somethings looking to party to wedding parties, couples, and various other groups. If you're reading this review and remember a large group in early April from MN in the US wearing pink pants one night....then you know first hand who we are and that we loved this place! I absolutely have to give a shout out to all of the staff and Gran Porto Real, and most of all David (Dave) and Chris from the lobby bar. Not sure what the hotel is paying these dudes, but its not enough, they made us want to come back! We spent the early part of every night with these two bartenders and besides having awesome service, we had a great time! They added to our fun/positive/crazy attitudes and we'll definitely look to meet up with them again in the future. The pools at Gran Porto Real are awesome. We hung out at the upstairs pool bar a lot because of the swim up bar and the fact that we could plug in our speakers and jam while swimming/drinking all day. The main pool is awesome too.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: katrinaherts
Reviews.Content: i dont know what some people expect but i thought this hotel was brilliant! the location is perfect, its so clean someone is always sweeping and washing the floors and the service is amazing! the swim up bar at the tranquil pool was very relaxing and drinks are very tasty! the beach has white sand and clear water the best i've ever seen! i was feeling nervous about going to this hotel due to the negative reviews but had nothing to worry about! the bars do close quite early but there is a 24hr lobby with a beer pump and a fridge with wine in. there is also a coffee machine and pepsi pump with food available! the staff at this hotel are so friendly and make the holiday so relaxed. i will definitely be returning to this hotel for another fantastic holiday!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “TIME OF MY LIFE!”
Reviews.Author: nes147
Reviews.Content: This resort was absolutely amazing! The location was wonderful. 5th ave was great for shopping. 12 st was fun at night with all the clubs. We felt safe the whole time everywhere we went. The water was purified at the resort so no one got sick which was one of our biggest concerns. The staff at the resort was the best. Dave Ancona and Cris were amazing bar tenders and we appreciated all the hard work they did to make our days enjoyable. Jesus and Pablo worked so hard out on the beach in the hot sun all day to keep our drinks filled and cold. These guys were all awesome. Can't wait to go back. I would without a doubt recommend this resort to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Hard working staff provide extra service and comfort”
Reviews.Author: wes_hepburn
Reviews.Content: An excellent 9 day stay was made special due to extra attention from staff members. Beautiful hotel and fun evenings. Very heartfelt thanks to Freddy for arranging our group lunches and dinners in the buffet restaurant. Also in the buffet special thanks to Captain Eliazar for special dish of deep fried callamari. Our buffet waiters Ismael, Victor, Frank provided exceptional service and entertaining table side flaming coffee beverages. From the pool and lobby bar thank you to Salvador, Marcos, Avila, Carolina, and Elizabeth. Maria and David from the lobby bar and thanks to Erika and everyone at the front desk. These people go way beyond their duties and provide comfort and prompt service. We traveled with an extended family group and were made to feel like we received special treatment. Our 2 hour lunches and dinners have re-invigorated me. We were never hurried and it seemed like the staff were enjoying serving us as much as we enjoyed being served. Thanks again to everyone. Freddy you are very good at your jobs. Hola!

Reviews.Title: “Great Time!”
Reviews.Author: jphils
Reviews.Content: My family of five (wife and 3 children 12, 9, and 4) went with our neighbors (2 adults and 2 children) the week before Easter. Everything was awesome in terms of weather, accommodations, service and cleanliness. The only negative would be the amount of "charter" type boats on the beach and the kids club being inside with little variety and no evening hours. My son has food allergies and the wait staff, chefs and hosts were fabulous! Eliazar, Antonio, Sergio and Dioscori were especiallty great! Our room overlooked the pool and the ocean and was immaculate daily; with the bar getting restocked daily. Everyone had a great tiem and we were never pressured to do anything we didn't want to. I would definitely go back with my family!

Reviews.Title: “Great holiday BUT .....”
Reviews.Author: carlkay
Reviews.Content: First of all I agree with the positive reviews on this hotel, in terms of the hardworking staff and the excellent service that they provide. Also we were happy with our room, the variety of food on offer, the position of the hotel which can not be faulted, and the overall cleanliness of the hotel. The only issue I want to raise for the benefit of others seeking a relaxing break is that due to the wedding parties booked in at this hotel, peace and quiet is not always achievable. There are 2 pools at this hotel, the larger pool near the beach with lots of activities on offer, and the 'tranquil' pool on the 3rd floor. Given that we are 2 couples with no children we chose to spend our time around the 'tranquil' pool, especially after a 13 hour flight from the UK. Unfortunately large parties of people celebrating the wedding of their friends/family descended on the 'tranquil' pool and literally 'took over', the alcohol flowed, music was played very loudly and there was no consideration for other guests who also wanted to enjoy their much needed holiday. At one point a security guard was called by a member of staff and guests were asked to turn the music off, but as soon as he left the music was put back on!! This hotel holds many weddings and so this was not a 'one off' situation, therefore I do think the hotel needs to think about how they can manage to meet the needs of ALL its guests. Perhaps a member of staff needs to be around that pool permanently to ensure that noise levels are kept to an acceptable standard for everyone. We made a good friend in Phillippe, the barman at the 'tranquil' pool and we felt so sorry for him, trying to serve large parties of people singled handed who wanted to get as much alcohol down their necks before the bar closed at 4pm. This is just to warn people that they may not get the peace and quiet that they hoped for, particularly at the 'tranquil' pool.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel needs better acoustics.”
Reviews.Author: TEXAS2_11
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful hotel, but the acoustics really need work. We booked our room on the first floor so we could get a Jr. Suite Walk-Out room. We could hear people coming in at all hours of the night. It was very noisy. Also, the walk out room sounded like you could step right into the ocean from your room, but actually outside the patio was two rows of canbanas and the four rows of beach chairs. Most of the staff were very helpful and friendly. I would not go back to that hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: kaityogill
Reviews.Content: We recently returned from our trip to Playa del Carmen. We stayed at the Porto Real and it was very nice. There was beautiful tile everywhere which made all noise echo. That was a problem at night. By 10ish the noise had mostly died down. The room was beautiful! We had a junior suit. It was like a palace! We had two problems which ended up being "operator error". But, both times we called for help someone was there immediately to help. Our room was cleaned by noon and very well done. The food was good with lots of variety. The staff in the dining room was super friendly and fast with drinks. We had a great time!

Reviews.Title: “Aquarium steps from the door !”
Reviews.Author: OParent
Reviews.Content: My husband and I revisited this fantastic properity April 12-19th,2011. We have stayed at this resort exclusively since 1998 and discover new and exciting reasons to return every year! We found the snorkeling right off the front of the resort to be teeming with many species of tropical fish,too many to count ! They have snorkel gear free for your use . The beach just to the left across the pier is great for swimming but no fish to see there. We were greeted in the lobby by Julio who is usually the first smiling face we see when our Best Day transfer drops us off (Best Day is arranged for us by US Airways Vacations) never had a delay or problem with their superb service.Julio is just as happy to see us as we are to see him ! Manager Mr.Nicolas Vasquiz always greets us with a warm handshake and hugs, he walks the beach at midday checking with the guests to see that their expectations are being met. Nice touch to have a hands on Manager accessible to the guests. Our Junior Suite was kept clean and tidy as well as decorated daily with flowers and towel art by Guadalupe Chan,she knew our schedule by the second day and when we returned to our room prior to lunch it was always complete. Mini fridge was stocked daily with our favorite Superior Beer too. Edwardo gives us our daily Spanish lesson along with our beach towels every morning ,I should be fluent in Spanish but as long as Migual the bartender at the Trade Winds bar keeps making those delicious/ strong drinks for me all day my memory will continue to fail. Migual is the BEST ! The beach bar/chair/pool service is where The Gran Porto Real shines ! These employees are there ready to serve you without you even asking! Teresa,Jesus,Pablo,Jose are the heart and soul of the resort. Tireless in their efforts to make your vacation relaxing and carefree.Love you guys ! Food ! The main buffet ,Albatros serves a fantastic variety of tasty dishes,the creveche is yummy ! Captain Eliazar's theme nights are like dining around the world ,the shrimp (prawns) were huge ,we are delighted by the culinary differences each night and day. Waiters Jamie,Oscar,Verlaan,Marcelle and greeter Sherly make our meals there a delight.The IL Pescatore and Maria's are delicious as well ,love sitting on the porch watching bands stroll by playing music,so romantic ! The lobby bar is a great place to hang out with bartender David mixing our favorite drinks along with Fabian and Frank who was in training that week. Elizabeth who works the Lobby bar and 24 hour room greats us with smiles every day and ensures we have everything we need, We had 7 nights of pure rest and relaxation ,weather was perfect and the mix of guests from all over the world always makes for fun beach watching. The front desk seems to get a bad rap but we have always found check-in and out to be smooth and seemless ,I use the on-line check-in and they have my bracelet ready to attach ,which brings me to check out ...the saddest 10 minutes of the whole trip .Samantha at the front desk was so understanding as I stood there choking back tears when she cut my bracelet off,she softly said ,"we will welcome you back again soon." YES you will ! If you are thinking about booking a trip to Playa Del Carmen I highly reccommend The Gran Porto Real for a fantastic vacation. The OREARS from South Carolina,USA

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at the Gran Porto Real”
Reviews.Author: jdv
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at the Gran Porto Real. We chose this resort for it's location, right in Playa del Carmen. Our junior suite was lovely and very clean, housekeeping did an excellent job. The restaurants were very nice with wonderful service and good food. Every employee we encountered was friendly and efficient. The pool area is nice, and there is a small pool on the third floor. The beach is not good at the hotel, but that's Mother Nature. We would definitely return to the Gran Porto Real.

Reviews.Title: “Resort is excellent six years in a row”
Reviews.Author: fpump
Reviews.Content: We have gone to the Gran Porto Real Resort for the past six years; we have gone in late April to late May each year. The resort has been consistant in it's quality of food, cleanliness and service. Also, the price has not gone up muc h; maybe just a small percent, if any. We book through AAA with Delta Vacations, so the flight and resort reservations are in a single package. The staff is very friendly and work hard to pleae the customers. We know many of them since they have been around for multiple years. The resort is not as large as some of teh mega resorts in the area, and we like it this way. The restaurants, pool and bars are not over-crowded as a result. A pretty good mix of people; seniors (like us), younger folks with children, and all ages in-between. Beautiful beaches nearby; walk north on the beach and you can go for miles. Thanks to staff members Florencio, Ivan, Pablo, Jesus, Theresa, Chicken Little, andf many others.

Reviews.Title: “Gran Porto Real has ruined us for any other resort”
Reviews.Author: LovinPlaya
Reviews.Content: We stumbled upon a GREAT deal for this hotel.We had our eye on it for the last three years but could never afford the price. Arrived April 5th and unfortunately had to leave April 12th.The front desk help was quick and the bellboys were fast. Since this was our "virgin voyage" at the Gran Porto Real, we were given the BEST standard rooms they had.Ten feet from our room doors was the rooftop pool,swim up bar and sushi bar.Couldn't get any better than this.The grounds were meticulously maintained,the floors were SOOO shiny. Seemd that the staff were all specifically stationed to do one job fabulously.Ther are so many good things about this resort that it is hard to not write fifteen pages on it. THE STAFF were ALL fantastic, however there are always people that exceed your expectations.On the very first night,after a long day were got lucky.Oscar in the buffet dining room started our vacation off right.It was his first time preparing the "Magnificent Mayan Coffee".For those of you who have never experienced this coffee, picture bright blue flame cascading between vessels,and ending up in your specilly prepared glass. Woo Hoo.!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! The other stand outs in the buffet were: Ismael,Sergio and the best omelets were prepared by Trini.She is a genius with eggs.Each night at the buffet we were seated with one of our favorites who always made sure that our dining experience memorable.Ismael has teh brightest smile for you when you walk in, Sergio makes sure that you have everything you need before you eat. Lisset our housekeeper was so adorable I wanted to bring her home in my suitcase.The rooms were spotless and she took great care in making sure that when you returned to your room that everything was neat and orderly.As well as the most awesom etowl art we have ever seen. There is only one word to describe Philip, the bartender at the swim up & sushi bar - AWESOME. Now we had heard stories about the Italian restaurant,but no words describe the food and service here.You will have to come and eat here if you ever make it to Playa del Carmen.Jose was the gentleman who steered us through this culinary delight.He was even patient when one of our party asked teh couple next to us if we could take a picture of thier meal before they ate it. Thanks Pat! We all tried something different, so we were able to sample all the menu.The mini cheesecake- WOW. I think what says it all about this restaurant is that people who were not guests at the resort were lining up to pay for the experience. On a side note, Jose was extremely attentive without being intrusive. We have only been back for two weeks and are already starting to look for another deal to come back next year. At the start of this review they ask you to grade the different standards..the only reason we gave it 3 out 5 for value ..is because although you definately get the start treatment, we could not of afforded to pay the regualr price. Overall spectaular hotel, oustanding staff and the best trip we have had in Mexico (excluding my wedding day). Pictures are to follow . Terry /Pat /Les and Bean from Vancouver, Canada.

Reviews.Title: “perfecto”
Reviews.Author: bobCalgaryAlberta
Reviews.Content: what can I say,Yendaly at front desk was the 2nd best lady in mexico.She took care of my wife & I from 1st day to last day.Our room was great . This was our 4th time at the resort, and the service has got better each year. The beach staff [ jesus,pablo,jose,] were very good, the lounge and pool staff,[ Elizebeth,Miriam, Mary, Ana, and last but not least Therisa.] FANTASTICO...Restaurant staff ,Eliazar PERFECT, waiters,Antonio,Rutilio,Ismael,and geoudmi, the best.My wife and I did not participate in the pool sports, but were always well by them, Victor [ the chicken little ]was really good. Not the perfect beach, but hotel and staff make up for it. we will be back again next year, same place same time. Bob and Chris.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Staff and Lovely Hotel”
Reviews.Author: arporter112
Reviews.Content: This was my first trip to Mexico and I could not have picked a better hotel. The staff was incredible! The hotel was quaint enough that by the end of the week, workers knew you by name. The bartenders, Dave and Chris, were so friendly and making me and my best friend drinks quickly and with quality. While laying out on the beach our two favorite workers were Jesus and Pablo. It was quite hot and they delievered our drinks in no time! It was also nice that while we were laying out our maid Patricia had our room spotless. I have never seen a maid clean a room so well! I felt safe to leave my computer, cell phone, and iPod in the room. There were no security issues at all. We stayed in a Junior Suite and it was beautiful and spacious. The shower was so cool! It was very large. The hotel in general was beautiful. It was very open to the outdoors and you could feel the breeze from the ocean into the eating areas - so pleasant! At night there was entertainment, but we had so much fun at the bar with the bartenders. there was no need to venture out to them, although we heard from many guests that the shows were awesome. The food was also very good. The buffet had a large selection. The water was also purified so we felt fine drinking it. We were so happy with our trip and we loved the workers. They made our vacation perfecto :).

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service, but the pool is too small and the beach is not nice:(”
Reviews.Author: Ribs97
Reviews.Content: The service from the staff was impecable. Freddy, Miguel, and Sheryl take excellent care of you in the dining hall while Cesar, Alejandro, Karina, Victor, and Armando keep the pool entertainment going all day and NIGHT!!!! What great people to spend time with while on vacation! The only downside, which is a BIG one, was the BEACH:( I ran every morning on the beach and found that this hotels is by far the WORST as far as looks and swimming area. The only other complaint is since the beach is so poor the POOL should make up for that. BIG disappointment with this as well. If you did not get up by 6:30am to save a seat for you and your friends you were out of luck:( Not enough shade really took away from the fun at the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good middle of the road accomodation in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Zorro2426134
Reviews.Content: We booked our stay with our travel agent and we selected the Junior Suite - Oceanview (the Oceanview was a little suspect as our room faced the main road at the front and the only ocean that you could see was from the balcony!!!). The room itself was roomy and relatively clean and comfortable. We were a little disappointed that the beds were doubles and not queens (not sure why the hotel has this when families would usually book these types of rooms). The staff were very friendly and were always respectful & courteous. In particular we would like to stay thanks to Eduardo (Towel Station) & Dulce (Kids Club) - there were also others but we just can't remember their names....sorry!!! The hotel was very busy (particularly near the pool area), however the pool side service was reasonably good. The food at the outside bar was average at best - a self help bar is just not my thing!! The food was reasonable good - The Buffet, Mexican & Italian Restaurants were reasonably good and we enjoyed most meals. The only criticism were the occaisonal number of drunks roaming around the resort (only a few but it seemed that the hotel staff were paralysed with fear to limit serving these customers and would just continue serving them!!!). In addition, the rude and arrogant people returning back from night clubs between approx. 2 - 4am that would talk loudly and behave like idiots (most were Americans). I think that the hotel should simply remind guests to return to their rooms quietly (simple signs would achieve this - or conceirage staff simply reminding guests). We would recommend this to families, however we probably would have enjoyed the resort a little more if it was'nt as busy as it was.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible service!”
Reviews.Author: Brigitte78
Reviews.Content: The service at the Porto Real was incredible, especially from the restaurant where we were served like kings by Franck, Ivan, May and Antonio (Great style and smile everyday!). I will certainly come back as the room service was also charming. The cuisine is good, except the cakes and desserts which would need a good chef! But I was not there to eat. A special mention too to the cleanliness of the resort! I had a great vacation!

Reviews.Title: “This Time We Brought Friends”
Reviews.Author: galomax
Reviews.Content: We just stayed at the GPR for the 2nd time in the past two years. This time our good friends and their family from Wisconsin (we are from NJ) met us at GPR and were there most of our vacation. Like my last review, GPR, just like it sister adults only property across the street, the Royal, really deliver the highest quality 4 or 5 star all inclusive accomodations available. The kids (all boys 13, 10 and 7) had a great time with our friends' kids who are about the same ages and had no shortage of things to do. The kids got along great, made new friends, did some local beach exploring, and spent a bunch of time running around the facilities like they owned it, while the parents relaxed. I get the sense that none of the kids were bored. The rooms are top notch, and the food is also excellent, although not quite as good as the food at the Royal. While we ate out in town quite a bit, that was only because there are so many great restaurants in Playa to choose from. My personal favorite is Las Mananitas on 5th Ave. Great Mexican food with street side tables. So another great stay at GPR. I want to give special thanks to Rodrigo who works in the game room, our maid Loyrdos who help clean up after 3 boys, and Chicken who lead pool entertainment.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic - For Us”
Reviews.Author: tdidy
Reviews.Content: We had the best time at this resort. The location was amazing, the service outstanding and the food was great too. Particularly, the service on the beach was amazing.
